thread.section_title: CleanWaterStore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CleanWaterStore | cleanwaterstore.com
thread.title: Pete

author: Pete
title: Pete
text:
The quality of the equipment is first rate. However, the manual that was provided does not fully explain how to program the pulse per gallon and stroke per pulse to get the required dosage. Is it possible to get two or more pulses per gallon ? If the limit is one pulse per gallon and the flow meter's limit is 20 gallons per minute and the stroke limit is 6 strokes per pulse then the maximum pump output is 120 strokes per minute, not 180 as stated.
How can I achieve a dosage of 8 to 12 strokes per gallon (2.8 to 4.2 ml per gallon) since the solution concentration cannot be increased?
I need help since i cannot achieve the desired pH control.
